msg.msgText: Destination mapping rule {0}. Queue manager connection {1}. Unable to put to WebSphere MQ queue {2}. MQPUT Reason {3}.

msgExplanation.p: A failure occurred while attempting to put a message to a WebSphere MQ queue.

msgUserResponse.p: Use the reason code shown in the message to determine the cause of the failure and take appropriate action to rectify the problem.
